title: The Mystery of the Vanished Black Belt

infobox.Title:: The Mystery of the Vanished Black Belt
infobox.Japanese title:: 消えた黒帯の謎  (Kieta Kurōbi no Nazo)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Sonoko Suzuki  Makoto Kyogoku  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Detective Boys
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Nobuyuki Hiyama as Makoto Kyogoku, Makoto Kyogoku (young)  Hiroya Ishimaru as Tatsuhito Takami  Kazuki Yao as Ginji Kajiyoshi  Fujiko Takimoto as Hiroki Kadota  Arisa Kouri as Katsuto Kawaguchi  Hitomi Ueda as Norio Obashi  Taketora as Asai  Koichi Tochika as Matsumoto
infobox.Opening song:: Ikusen no Meikyū de Ikusen no Nazo o Toite

sections.Case: The Detective Boys, supervised by Kogoro, Ran, and Sonoko, have come to Osaka to make a tour of the USJ theme park. But as luck would have it, Sonoko has learned that Makoto happens to be in Osaka, too, and unwilling to go alone, but also unwilling to leave the kids without sensible supervision by taking Ran along - she decided to pay him an impromptu visit with Conan for company. As a result, Conan and Sonoko find themselves as guest in the karate dojo of Tatsuhito Takami, a renowned martial artist and an old acquaintance of Makoto, from whom the latter had picked up his stoic demeanor and occasional intimidating presence.
